revision.text: {{also|Yala}} ==Pukapukan== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|pkp|poz-pol-pro|*sala}}, from {{inh|pkp|poz-oce-pro|*salaq}}, from {{inh|pkp|poz-pro|*salaq}}. ===Noun=== {{head|pkp|noun}} # [[wrong]], [[misdeed]] # [[sin]] #: ''Na mate ia Iētū nō a tātou '''yala'''.'' #:: Jesus died for our '''sins'''. ====Derived terms==== * {{l|pkp|takayala||error, mistake}} ===Verb=== {{head|pkp|verb}} # to do [[wrong]] # to [[commit]] [[sin]] #: ''Na '''yala''' tātou i te Atua.'' #:: We have '''sinned''' agaist God. # to [[break]] a [[tapu]] ===Further reading=== * [http://pukapuka.world/dictionary/ Te Pukamuna | Pukapuka Dictionary] ---- ==Tatar== ===Noun=== {{head|tt|noun}} # [[suspicion]], [[false]] [[accusation]] # [[slander]] ---- ==Xhosa== ===Etymology=== {{rfe|xh}} ===Verb=== {{xh-verb|yala}} # {{lb|xh|transitive}} to [[advise]] # {{lb|xh|transitive}} to [[warn]], to [[admonish]] ====Inflection==== {{rfinfl|xh|verb}} ---- ==Yami== ===Noun=== {{head|tao|noun}} # [[basket]] ---- ==Yoruba== ====Alternative forms==== *{{alter|yo|يَلَ}} ===Pronunciation=== *{{yo-IPA|yálà}} ===Conjunction=== {{yo-pos|conjunction|yálà}} # [[either]], [[whether]] ---- ==Zulu== ===Etymology=== {{rfe|zu}} ===Verb=== {{zu-verb|yala}} # {{lb|zu|transitive}} to [[warn]] ====Inflection==== {{zu-infl-verb|L}} ===References=== *{{R:zu:ZED||6.3}}
